A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I had to write a review for the first time ever. I’ve been a Star Wars fan since a child. Disney’s move to hire Rian Johnson was a huge mistake! If something works\, don’t fix it! He changed a classic into a try too hard\, corny\, one liner space ball mess. Really? Do you think after all this time\, that we envision Princess Leia and Luke’s reunion to be her saying.. “I know I changed my hair”!!? And the scene changes that was a trademark of SW ..all gone. Along with all the original characters now! And why? What was the point of Luke dying? And why did he just die? I mean Carrie is gone\, you killed off Harrison\, so why take Mark out of it? And Rey and Bens connection was a let down! Princess Leia floating through space just weird and like Snoke wouldn’t realize that Kylo was about to kill him... wow! Powerful with the force he is! And the entire movie was built up on who Rays parents are.. and guess what? They’re nobodies! Some exciting twist there! So SW is dead and full of new unfunny characters. Thanks Disney and thanks Rian for ruining a masterpiece!
